languages.text: {n}Из груди арбитра доносится тяжелый вздох. Спустя миг он уже столь же спокоен, как и всегда. Недрогнувшим голосом Соломон произносит:{/n} "Как... неудачно. Что же, я готов удовлетворить ваше любопытство, но прошу о приватности".

{n}A heavy sigh comes from Solomorne's chest, but a moment later, he is back to his calm self. His voice is steady as he speaks:{/n} "How... unfortunate. Well, I am ready to satisfy your curiosity, but I would plead for some privacy."
languages.original_text: {n}Из груди арбитра доносится тяжелый вздох. Спустя миг он уже столь же спокоен, как и всегда. Недрогнувшим голосом Соломон произносит:{/n} "Как... неудачно. Что же, я готов удовлетворить ваше любопытство, но прошу о приватности".

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンの胸から重いため息が漏れた。しかし、すぐに平静さを取り戻した。彼の声は落ち着いていた。{/n}「それは…残念です。さて、あなたの好奇心に応える準備はできていますが、できれば二人きりでお話ししたい」
languages.original_text: {n}A heavy sigh comes from Solomorne's chest, but a moment later, he is back to his calm self. His voice is steady as he speaks:{/n} "How... unfortunate. Well, I am ready to satisfy your curiosity, but I would plead for some privacy."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンの胸から重いため息が漏れた。しかし、すぐに平静さを取り戻した。彼の声は落ち着いていた。{/n}「それは…残念です。さて、あなたの好奇心に応える準備はできていますが、できれば二人きりでお話ししたい」

languages.text: {n}Ein schwerer Seufzer entringt sich Solomornes Brust, aber einen Augenblick später ist er wieder die Ruhe selbst. Als er spricht, ist seine Stimme fest:{/n} "Das ... ist Pech. Nun, ich bin bereit, Eure Neugier zu befriedigen, würde aber um etwas Privatsphäre bitten."
languages.original_text: {n}A heavy sigh comes from Solomorne's chest, but a moment later, he is back to his calm self. His voice is steady as he speaks:{/n} "How... unfortunate. Well, I am ready to satisfy your curiosity, but I would plead for some privacy."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein schwerer Seufzer entringt sich Solomornes Brust, aber einen Augenblick später ist er wieder die Ruhe selbst. Als er spricht, ist seine Stimme fest:{/n} "Das ... ist Pech. Nun, ich bin bereit, Eure Neugier zu befriedigen, würde aber um etwas Privatsphäre bitten."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne laisse échapper un profond soupir, mais reprend immédiatement contenance. Il déclare d'un ton mesuré :{/n} « Voilà qui est... fâcheux. Je ferai tout mon possible pour satisfaire votre curiosité, mais je vous prie d'accepter d'en discuter dans un lieu plus... discret. »
languages.original_text: {n}A heavy sigh comes from Solomorne's chest, but a moment later, he is back to his calm self. His voice is steady as he speaks:{/n} "How... unfortunate. Well, I am ready to satisfy your curiosity, but I would plead for some privacy."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne laisse échapper un profond soupir, mais reprend immédiatement contenance. Il déclare d'un ton mesuré :{/n} « Voilà qui est... fâcheux. Je ferai tout mon possible pour satisfaire votre curiosité, mais je vous prie d'accepter d'en discuter dans un lieu plus... discret. »

languages.text: {n}Un profundo suspiro escapa del pecho de Solomorne, pero un instante después ha recuperado su flema habitual y habla con voz firme:{/n} «Qué... desafortunado. En fin, estoy dispuesto a satisfacer su curiosidad, pero le rogaría que al menos me concediese un poco de intimidad».
languages.original_text: {n}A heavy sigh comes from Solomorne's chest, but a moment later, he is back to his calm self. His voice is steady as he speaks:{/n} "How... unfortunate. Well, I am ready to satisfy your curiosity, but I would plead for some privacy."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un profundo suspiro escapa del pecho de Solomorne, pero un instante después ha recuperado su flema habitual y habla con voz firme:{/n} «Qué... desafortunado. En fin, estoy dispuesto a satisfacer su curiosidad, pero le rogaría que al menos me concediese un poco de intimidad».

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙的胸腔里发出了一声沉重的叹息，但过了一会儿，他再次恢复了平静，以平稳的声音开了口。{/n}“这真是……让人遗憾。好吧，我愿意满足你的好奇心，但我也希望你能给我留些隐私空间。”
languages.original_text: {n}A heavy sigh comes from Solomorne's chest, but a moment later, he is back to his calm self. His voice is steady as he speaks:{/n} "How... unfortunate. Well, I am ready to satisfy your curiosity, but I would plead for some privacy."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙的胸腔里发出了一声沉重的叹息，但过了一会儿，他再次恢复了平静，以平稳的声音开了口。{/n}“这真是……让人遗憾。好吧，我愿意满足你的好奇心，但我也希望你能给我留些隐私空间。”

languages.text: {n}Ağır bir şekilde iç çeken Solomorne'un göğsü yükseliyor ancak bir an sonra tekrar sakinleşiyor. Monoton bir şekilde konuşuyor.{/n} "Ne büyük... Talihsizlik. Merakınızı memnuniyetle gidereceğim ancak biraz mahremiyet rica ediyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}A heavy sigh comes from Solomorne's chest, but a moment later, he is back to his calm self. His voice is steady as he speaks:{/n} "How... unfortunate. Well, I am ready to satisfy your curiosity, but I would plead for some privacy."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ağır bir şekilde iç çeken Solomorne'un göğsü yükseliyor ancak bir an sonra tekrar sakinleşiyor. Monoton bir şekilde konuşuyor.{/n} "Ne büyük... talihsizlik. Peki, merakınızı memnuniyetle gidereceğim ancak biraz mahremiyet rica ediyorum."

languages.original_text: {n}A heavy sigh comes from Solomorne's chest, but a moment later, he is back to his calm self. His voice is steady as he speaks:{/n} "How... unfortunate. Well, I am ready to satisfy your curiosity, but I would plead for some privacy."
